Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Southbound Reroute near 71st/Stony Island
ShortDescription: SB 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 70th, Dorchester, 71st and Stony Island: due to, street blockage near 71st/Stony Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 70th, Dorchester, 71st and Stony Island: due to, street blockage near 71st/Stony Island.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near 73rd/Exchange
ShortDescription: NB 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Exchange, & 71st, due to street blockage near 73rd/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Exchange, & 71st, due to street blockage near 73rd/Exchange.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Jackson. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Jackson.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
